item.title: Dev Log 6
item.description: A LOT was added with this n i’m really happy with how it turned out!!! +Added a new dynamic face with blinking Currently, theres only 1 face but I plan to make a LOOOOT more. You’re able to change the face color Different Eyes! Example 1 Example 2 Example 3 +Added an idle, walk, and run animation +Added music whenever the lighting changes ~Changed the base walking speed to be 6.

item.title: Dev Log 7
item.description: Gonna pick up this project again. I have an idea on making a “Brain” system I can just drag and drop into NPCs. Here’s the Eye/tracking system +Added NPC sight system Different Eyes! Example 1 Your browser does not support the video tag. Planning for other NPC brain power. Sight is ooonly the beginning! I have an idea to add Hearing, and Memory. Memory will be really useful for when the NPC can walk.

item.title: Dev Log 7.01
item.description: Mini Log? Yes! I’m gonna start doing mini logs for stuff that’s not really that much content. +Made a dummy with no code Different Eyes! Example 1 Your browser does not support the video tag. This was fun to make lol, it let me acually look at roblox objects and how they work. Pretty good exercise

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I’m Hex n I’m from the US! I also go by Hexa if there’s another “Hex” present. I am a “jack-of-all-trades” meaning i specialize in many different skills, such as digital and traditional art, 3d modeling, coding, story telling, and game making. I don’t have much going on in my life, but at the moment I’m majoring in bio-chemistry so I can eventually be an anesthesiologist. Thanks for checking out my blog

item.title: Dev Log 5
item.description: Content Warning? Blood | I tripped my foot on a hurt part on accident lol Added a debug to change the lighting Your browser does not support the video tag. Also added a display for skintones. My vision is that these will be the only skintones in the game but you can use a slider to change the brightness and saturation to your liking Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: Dev Log 4
item.description: Added a LOT of hats to the game. finally swagging. Changed the lighting to 4 different presets. Now the game looks even better than before. the Image above is using Noon Evening Night Blood Moon

item.title: Dev Log 3
item.description: Content Warning? Blood Made it so the player’s health affects the players normal speed/sprinting speed. I remember this taking a long time and just being generally annoying to make. Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: Dev Log 2
item.description: Content Warning? Blood Added a whoooole bunch of outfits. Maybe for a rank system? IDK LOL Your browser does not support the video tag. Added some blood splatters when the player is hit. The speed is also affected a little but it wasnt perfected until the next dev log. Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: Dev Log 1
item.description: First steps into the game. Made a damage system. I was unsure on how I wanted this game to turn out lol Your browser does not support the video tag. Also added a sprint system. This took a while to do lol but I’m pretty proud of it. Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: Where To Find Me
item.description: Hi again To be honest, I’m not sure! Your best bet would be my instagram or my twitter (X). I tend to not add random people on discord so good luck messaging me there!
